name: tm19
effect: Teaches Giga Drain to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Telekinesis to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Giga Drain Gen I: Seismic Toss)

flavor_text.black-white: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
